summary: Gives Lydia her own custom mesh armor.
descriptionHtml:
[b][i][font=Georgia][size=4][b][i]

This is the  first entry in my "House Armor" series.  [b][i][font=Georgia]I never liked Lydia's look.  Steel armor, I just don't like it. To me she was a hard character to fit, her character seemed to rate higher armor than bandit styled Iron armor, but also seemed to fall a little below "Knight-like" Steel Plate armor. After literally trying every armor in-game, I still never found a good fit. So I made this, Lydia's House armor.  It has a "put together" look, like she made it out various armor sets.[/font][/i][/b]  I  wanted keep it compatible with mods which alter her appearance, so I didn't outfit her with it by default, instead you will find it in Dragon's Reach in her backpack.  The custom armor is the body mesh only, I did this to allow for customization, helmet, gloves, and boots are free to mix and match. Please leave any questions/comments/feedback, and endorse if you enjoy the mod.[/i][/b][/size][size=4][b][i]
[/i][/b][/size][size=4][b][i]

Notes:
[/i][/b][/size][size=4][b][i]This mod does not alter Lydia's NPC form, if you want her to look like my screens, you'll need [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28712/?]this mod.[/url]
[/i][/b][/size][size=4][b][i]This mod features no textures, to get the exact look in the screens you will to install [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24909/?]Cabal's textures[/url]
[/i][/b][/size][size=4][b][i]Depending on you install options, the colors will change.
[/i][/b][/size][size=4][b][i]
[/i][/b][/size][size=4][b][i]
F.A.Q.[/i][/b][/size][size=4][b][i]
[/i][/b][/size][size=4][b][i]
Q. What are House Armors?
[/i][/b][/size][size=4][b][i]A. Just an idea I made up, like in Game of Thrones, each [/i][/b][/size][size=4][b][i]House has it's own sigil, the idea here was to make armors that were handed [/i][/b][/size][size=4][b][i]down, and added to, from person to person within a family, becoming their sigil.[/i][/b][/size][size=4][b][i]
[/i][/b][/size][size=4][b][i]
Q. Can the player use these?
[/i][/b][/size][size=4][b][i]A. Yes, but only within the same gender.[/i][/b][/size][size=4][b][i]
[/i][/b][/size][size=4][b][i]
Q. Why no skimpy G-strings, and high heels?
[/i][/b][/size][size=4][b][i]A. Armour or armor;  a protective covering that is used to prevent damage from being inflicted to an  individual,  by direct contact weapons or projectiles, usually during combat, or from damage caused by a potentially dangerous environment or action.[/i][/b][/size]
